tool.name: ServiceNowLocationLoader

param.name: in_facility_layer
param.dialogReference: Facilities Layer of the ArcGIS Indoors Information Model.
param.pythonReference: Facilities Layer of the ArcGIS Indoors Information Model.

param.name: in_level_layer
param.dialogReference: Levels Layer of the ArcGIS Indoors Information Model.
param.pythonReference: Levels Layer of the ArcGIS Indoors Information Model.

param.name: in_unit_layer
param.dialogReference: Units Layer of the ArcGIS Indoors Information Model.
param.pythonReference: Units Layer of the ArcGIS Indoors Information Model.

param.name: keepDuplicates
param.dialogReference:
Specifies whether to load duplicate locations in ServiceNow location model or overwrite existing locations

Checked - Duplicates are loaded if location already exists in ServiceNow

Unchecked - Updates the location if already exists in ServiceNow
param.pythonReference:
Specifies whether to load duplicate locations in ServiceNow location model or overwrite existing locations

Checked - Duplicates are loaded if location already exists in ServiceNow

Unchecked - Updates the location if already exists in ServiceNow

param.name: in_servicenow_url
param.dialogReference: URL of the ServiceNow REST API endpoint
param.pythonReference: URL of the ServiceNow REST API endpoint

param.name: in_username
param.dialogReference: Login User ID as required by ServiceNow Rest endpoint
param.pythonReference: Login User ID as required by ServiceNow Rest endpoint

param.name: in_password
param.dialogReference: Login Password as required by ServiceNow Rest endoint
param.pythonReference: Login Password as required by ServiceNow Rest endoint

tool.summary: <P>Loads ServiceNow location model with coordinate locations for each Facility, all Levels for each Facility and all Units for each Level and models the hierarchy relationship between the Units, Levels and Facilities</P>
tool.usage: <LI><P>The tool accepts Facilities, Levels and Units Layer as input</P></LI><LI><P>The user accessing the supplied ServiceNow rest endpoint must have Read/Write privileges on ServiceNow cmn_location table</P></LI><LI><P>The tools loads the ServiceNow location model with location name and coordinate information for the Units, Levels and Facilities</P></LI>

scriptExample.title: ServiceNow Location Loader sample
scriptExample.para: The following code sample demonstrates the usage of the tool to load data in ServiceNow location model with duplicates
